body_html: I don't know if you were running with magma, but if you were, some magma functions actually run on CPU if the sizes are small enough. If you nvprof your executable, whether or not this is happening should become clear.

body: I don't know if you were running with magma, but if you were, some magma functions actually run on CPU if the sizes are small enough. If you nvprof your executable, whether or not this is happening should become clear.
